_header: But woe is him that is in woe
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, Passion of
_description: Couplet describing the lonely state of Christ at the time of his passion, in a sermon (?by John of Bromyard), ‘de passione domini vel In Ramispalmarum’ — one couplet

CULKk424.Transcription:
But wo ys hym þat ys in woÞat haþe no frend to playn
                    hym to
CULKk424.Note: See also 2160 and 751 in same sermon.
